# makeMTL4CommandQueue(descriptor:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a new command queue from a queue descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeMTL4CommandQueue(descriptor: MTL4CommandQueueDescriptor) throws -> any MTL4CommandQueue
```

## Parameters

- **descriptor**: A [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandQueueDescriptor] instance that configures the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandQueue] instance.

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandQueue] instance, or `nil` if the function failed.
title: makeMTL4CommandQueue(descriptor:)
